name: denexp
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cq), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(cfv(cdenom, co(c0, cexp, c1)), co(cfv(cdenom, c0), cexp, c1)))

stmt.origin: simprd(wa(wcel(c0, cq), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(cfv(cdenom, co(c0, cexp, c1)), co(cfv(cdenom, c0), cexp, c1)), wceq(cfv(cnumer, co(c0, cexp, c1)), co(cfv(cnumer, c0), cexp, c1)))
